name: Bendy and the ink Machine (Beta)
description:
Bendy and the Ink Machine (beta ) is a beta version of BATIM around 2017 I think .  so yep not much to say.

BATIM belongs to themeatlygames and mike mood

screenshots and  logo is from themeatlygames/mike mood

the cover and banner is made by me

check out  the complete version of Bendy and the ink machine  : https://joeydrewstudios.itch.io/batim

btw this is not official site and  not the creator of BATIM
